workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.15239171416557756 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.4327843663052368 --weight-decay 0.0003905360309807624 --lr 0.0005302382385924265 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 77246 --max-lr 0.0007512187328051456 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.44885965509948855 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.08303645460059968 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
